characters.story: "JAI!" the hamster cage and tree command sharply - fortifying the stockade, village and fort!
"SHYEN!" the house, eyes, heart command sharply - the constitution, the law and principles!
"Ching?" the sun questions curiously - is it sunny, clear and bright?
"TSAI!" the pack of wild dogs sings cheerfully - to guess, suppose and suspect!
"JING!" the vase telescope commands sharply - to pacify, calm and suppress!
"JAI!" the person and responsibility command sharply - must repay the debt and what we owe!
"JEE!" the wooden leg and responsibility sing cheerfully - the remains, traces and miracle!
"SHUNG!" the cattle sing cheerfully - domestic animals, livestock and sacrifice!
"Lung?" the pinnacle and walking legs question curiously in the ceiling cell - impressive, prosperous and thriving!
"SHING!" the flesh and star sing cheerfully - but there's a fishy smell, bloody disaster!
"SHING!" the pack of wild dogs and star sing cheerfully - the orangutan, ape and primate!
An striking symbol for awaken that whispers "Xǐng!" softly - a vivid image to remember!
"SHYAH!" the eyes sing cheerfully - but they're visionless, blind - just wasting time!
"SHYAH?" the car questions curiously about harm - will they administer jurisdiction over the church?
"CHEE!" he commands sharply - sign the contract, the agreement and deed!
"BAI!" the hand, ceiling and bushes command sharply - to adore, worship and bow!
"JYEH?" the water questions curiously - is it spotless, clean and pure of heart?
"FUNG!" the insect sings cheerfully - the bee with honey in a swarm!
"FUNG!" the mountain sings cheerfully - the peak, the summit and crest!
"FUNG!" the metal sings cheerfully - the cutting edge, the blade so sharp!
"Fung?" the road questions curiously - did we chance upon this encounter and meet?
"Pung?" the flowers question curiously after chancing upon this disheveled, messy lotus capsule!
"Fung?" the thread questions curiously after chancing upon the chance to sew, stitch seamlessly!
"DZOH!" he commands sharply - play an instrument, perform the music!
"TSOH!" the water commands sharply - gather together, assemble and join the excitement!
"Chin?" the bonzai and wild rice question curiously - from the Qin dynasty?
The springtime insects bend down drooping - foolish, stupid idiots!
The fingers and proffer bend down drooping - to carry in both hands, to hold the plate!
"TAN!" the mouth commands sharply - to sigh, lament with a breath!
"JYEN!" the task sings cheerfully - though it's arduous, difficult and hard!
"TAN!" the water sings cheerfully - at the beach, the shore with sand!
"BEE!" he commands sharply - to complete, finish and graduate!
